Uses of Interface
im.tox.jtoxcore.ToxFriend

  • Packages that use ToxFriend 
    Package Description
    im.tox.jtoxcore
    This package supplies the base classes needed for using the Tox library in java.
    im.tox.jtoxcore.callbacks
    This package contains the abstract Callback classes needed for the various callbacks supplied by the native tox library.

    • Uses of ToxFriend in im.tox.jtoxcore

      Classes in im.tox.jtoxcore with type parameters of type ToxFriend 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  FriendList<F extends ToxFriend>
      Interface definition for a Tox Friendlist implementation
      class  JTox<F extends ToxFriend>
      This is the main wrapper class for the tox library.

    • Uses of ToxFriend in im.tox.jtoxcore.callbacks

      Classes in im.tox.jtoxcore.callbacks with type parameters of type ToxFriend 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CallbackHandler<F extends ToxFriend>
      Callback Handler class which contains methods to manage the callbacks for a JTox instance.
      interface  OnActionCallback<F extends ToxFriend>
      Callback class for receiving actions from friends
      interface  OnConnectionStatusCallback<F extends ToxFriend>
      Callback class for receiving connection status changes from friends
      interface  OnMessageCallback<F extends ToxFriend>
      Callback class for receiving messages
      interface  OnNameChangeCallback<F extends ToxFriend>
      Callback class for receiving name changes
      interface  OnReadReceiptCallback<F extends ToxFriend>
      Callback class for receiving read receipts
      interface  OnStatusMessageCallback<F extends ToxFriend>
      Callback for receiving status message changes
      interface  OnUserStatusCallback<F extends ToxFriend>
      Callback for receiving user status changes
